p.k: There's no nicer way to start your morning on a bright, sunny day than with an ice cold glass of chocolate milk, so Cayla pads to the kitchen in her underwear to fix herself a sweet treat. Cayla takes a slow swallow of milk before pouring it over her breasts, letting her man lick the creamy liquid off before he carries her to the bed and laps at her wet pussy! Their passionate fucking builds to a climax, and as Vince cums on Cayla's face, the gorgeous blonde can't wait to lap it all up!
